LanguageData.RoyaltyTips.TitleMilitaryAid: Some title permits allow the holder to call for military aid. This can save you in a tough moment.
LanguageData.RoyaltyTips.NoblesDemandPrivileges: Nobles from the Empire will demand all the privileges of their title. Your own titled colonists will be more flexible, unless they are greedy or jealous.
LanguageData.RoyaltyTips.RoyalArmor: Prestige armor and eltex apparel will also satisfy the apparel requirements of royal titles.
LanguageData.RoyaltyTips.TitleInheritance: If a title holder dies, their title goes to their chosen heir.
LanguageData.RoyaltyTips.ChangeHeir: You can change the heir of a title holder through the comms console. However, this requires completing a ritual.
LanguageData.RoyaltyTips.FreePsychicAmplifier: The Empire bestows a free level of psylink upon anyone who earns the title required to use it.
LanguageData.RoyaltyTips.IllegalImplantUse: Psylink neuroformers can be acquired through quests. These items can give a person psychic powers.
LanguageData.RoyaltyTips.InstallingPsychicAmplifier: Gaining a new level of psylink grants knowledge of one random psychic power.
LanguageData.RoyaltyTips.PsycastAdvantage: Psychic powers can give you significant advantage in combat.
LanguageData.RoyaltyTips.PsycastFactionRelations: Using a psychic power on an ally will harm faction relations - but only if it has negative effects.
LanguageData.RoyaltyTips.PsycastInvisibility: Psychic invisibility doesn't wear off when you attack.
LanguageData.RoyaltyTips.PsychicEntropyLimit: Going over your neural heat limit can save you in a desperate situation - but the psychic breakdown can last a while.
LanguageData.RoyaltyTips.PsycastSensitivity: Creatures with higher psychic sensitivity are affected more by psychics.
LanguageData.RoyaltyTips.EltexGear: Dressing your psycasters in eltex gear will increase their neural heat limit and dissipation rate.
LanguageData.RoyaltyTips.MechClusterPowercell: When fighting a mech cluster, try shooting their power cells. They explode, dealing heavy damage to surrounding creatures and structures.
LanguageData.RoyaltyTips.MechClusterDormant: Some mech clusters remain dormant until disturbed. Use that time to prepare your attack.
LanguageData.RoyaltyTips.RoyalTributeCollector: The Imperial royal tribute collector arrives twice per year, and accepts prisoners and gold in exchange for honor.
LanguageData.RoyaltyTips.MechClusterDormantTrigger: You can safely walk right past a dormant mech cluster, as long as you don't attack it or trigger a proximity activator.
LanguageData.RoyaltyTips.SkipPsycastsMultiuse: The psychic skip power works on self, allies, enemies, and even items. The tactical possibilities are endless.
LanguageData.RoyaltyTips.JumpPackRescue: You can carry a downed ally while using the jump pack. Aerial rescues save lives.
